detailsData.title: Flat Fees
detailsData.content: We offer flat fees so you are never surprised. This ensures transparency and trust in our services.

detailsData.title: Plan Review
detailsData.content: We provide a plan review every 3 years at no extra cost. This keeps your estate plan current and effective.

detailsData.title: Virtual Planning
detailsData.content: We offer virtual legal planning for your convenience. This allows you to plan from the comfort of your home.

detailsData.title: Membership Programs
detailsData.content: Our membership programs ensure your plan works throughout your lifetime. This includes annual reviews and updates.

address: 1901 Newport Boulevard, Suite 350, Costa Mesa, CA 92627
valueProp: Do you know what would happen legally—to you, your loved ones, your money, and everything else you care about—if something unexpected happened to you? If you have an estate plan and it’s out of date, your assets could be lost to the State Department of Unclaimed Property, or to an unnecessary Court process. If you don’t know exactly what would happen for everyone you love and everything you own, then the first step is to find out exactly what would happen, legally and financially, so that you can decide if the current state of your affairs is okay with you.
openHours: Monday to Friday – 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM (By appointment only)
